data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Santiago Rodríguez, Dominican Republic into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santiago Rodríguez, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Santiago Rodríguez, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Santiago Rodríguez hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Santiago Rodríguez to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Father, convict the 6,460 believers in Santiago Rodríguez to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Santiago Rodríguez.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Santiago Rodríguez, Dominican Republic has a population of 59,600.

We estimate Santiago Rodríguez has 6,460 people who might know Jesus, 49,440 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,700 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 59,600 people living in Santiago Rodríguez, Dominican Republic. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
